name: @agent-web-portal/cas-stack
description: CAS (Content-Addressable Storage) service with global dedup and scope-based access control

scripts.dev:sam: bun run build && sam build && sam local start-api --port 3500
scripts.build: bun build src/handler.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target node --external '@aws-sdk/*' && mv dist/handler.js dist/handler.mjs
scripts.deploy: bun run sam:build && bun run sam:deploy
scripts.deploy:google: bun run sam:build && bun run scripts/deploy-with-google.ts
